Akamai has developed and provided solutions for global enterprises to build, secure and accelerate their applications and digital experiences . Our massively distributed global network is comprised of core and distributed compute sites, more than 4,300 edge points-of-presence in approximately 130 countries and over 700 cities . Our strategy is to help continue to power and protect business online by offering security and compute services with industry-leading reliability, scale and expertise .
 AI has been a major focus of corporate initiatives for enterprises in multiple verticals and across the globe . Akamai’s web application and API protection solutions protect web, API and mobile app traffic from attacks that take advantage of security flaws, protection from malicious automated attacks, credential abuse and account takeover, client-side protections .
 Akamai's Bot & Abuse portfolio provides tailored, specialized solutions to help customers protect against these threats . Account Protector offers full account lifecycle protections including the ability to defend against account takeover and abuse . API Security complements our application and API security portfolio by extending our visibility into the growing API threat landscape to detect and respond to threats .
 Akamai expects to offer a complete API security suite enabling customers to better discover “shadow” APIs and detect vulnerabilities and attacks . Guardicore’s microsegmentation solution helps our customers prevent malicious lateral movement in their network . The platform leverages AI to simplify user experience, vulnerability assessments, compliance and incident response .
 Akamai's cloud computing services include compute, storage, networking, database and container management services that are required to build, deploy and secure applications and workloads . The company acquired Linode Limited Liability Company, an established cloud computing platform, in March 2022, a significant milestone in its expansion into cloud computing .
 In 2024, Akamai's compute platform will span 41 datacenters in 36 locations . This includes upgrades to 5 existing datacencies and the introduction of 11 new datacacenters . These regions act as an extension of primary infrastructure deployed in core regions for organizations that aim to improve application performance to attract new customers in new or target regions .
 Akamai's ready-to-run solution is built on top of the cloud native Kubernetes technology Otomi . The solution automates the provisioning process, allowing developers to build and deploy highly distributed applications in a few clicks . This can cut deployment time from months to less than an hour and provides near-instant scaling as production workloads grow .
 Akamai media delivery solutions include video streaming and video player services, game and software delivery, broadcast operations, authoritative DNS, resolution and data and analytics . Underlying these solutions is technology to address variable connection speeds and device types, facilitate access to disparate locations around the world, accelerate large file downloads, reliably deliver high-quality live content across various devices and platforms .
 In 2024, Akamai continued to focus on fostering a community that enables employees to be productive . The importance of our workforce to our success is underscored by the inclusion of corporate mission critical goals centered on our employees . As of December 31, 2024, we had over 10,700 employees located in more than 30 countries (with approximately 65% of those employees located outside of the U.S.)
 Akamai is an equal opportunity employer that values the strength that diverse perspectives bring to the workplace . We do not tolerate discrimination on the basis of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race or ethnicity . We have eight employee resource groups that offer opportunities for employees to come together for mutual support, education and development .
 Our benefits programs (which vary by country and region) include healthcare and insurance benefits, health savings and flexible spending accounts, paid time off, family leave, family care resources, flexible work schedules and locations . Most employees are eligible to participate in our employee stock purchase plan . We conduct annual succession planning for senior leadership, which is overseen by our board of directors .
 All employees are eligible to participate in our Akamai Elevation performance review program . Nearly 15% of open positions were filled with internal candidates in 2024 . In May 2022, we launched FlexBase, which allows over 95% of employees to choose to work from their home office, a Company office, an approved workspace or a combination .
 Customers include Adobe, Aflac, Airbnb, Asus, Autodesk, Carnival Corporation, The Coca-Cola Company and The Washington Post . We measure each dimension in a quarterly anonymous survey, which allows us to track and report on workplace connection around the world . As of December 31, 2024, our public-sector customers included the U.S. Census Bureau, the . Department of . Defense, Department of Labor, the Department of Transportation and the U .S. Department of Treasury .
 Akamai's sales, services and marketing professionals are based in locations across the Americas, Europe, the Middle East and Asia-Pacific . Our integrated marketing strategies include public relations, digital programmatic advertising, paid search and SEO marketing, social media, e-mail marketing programs, events and webinars, participation at industry trade shows and ongoing training and sales enablement .
 We believe that we compete favorably with other companies in our industry through our global scale, reliability and expertise, which we believe provides the most effective means of meeting the needs of our customers . We also benefit from the high quality of our offerings, our customer service and the information we can provide to our customers about their online operations .
 Akamai is subject to complex foreign and U.S. laws and regulations in areas such as data privacy and localization, cybersecurity, liability for content delivered over our network, various internet regulations, bribery, sanctions, export controls, competition, tax and foreign exchange controls . Enactment and expansion of such laws would negatively impact our revenues or cause us to incur costs to ensure compliance .
 Chinese application was not sold to a neutral third party by January 19, 2025 . President Trump subsequently signed an executive order instructing the U.S. Attorney General to not take any action to enforce the passed legislation . Attorney General has since determined that our provision of services to this customer has not violated the law .
 Many of these laws and regulations are evolving and could be interpreted and applied in a manner that is inconsistent from country to country . For example, while we are generally not subject to regulations applicable to telecommunications companies, new or different interpretations of laws or regulations could subject us to regulatory supervision . We are unable to assess the possible effect of compliance with future requirements .
